results.title: Room and board
results.creator_credit: Randy Cartwright and University of California, Los Angeles
results.brief_description: Animated story about a man who spends his whole life trying to open a door, the only object in the empty room in which he exists.

results.title: Rocky horror and disco
results.brief_description: Choose from 20 songs selected from “The Rocky horror picture show” as well as disco hits set to an incongruous nature background. All lyrics appear on screen and the soundtrack is instrumental only. Please note: The disc plays PAL one side, NTSC the other.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet: a film-ballet after the tragedy by Shakespeare
results.brief_description: Historic performance by the legendary Galina Ulanova as Juliet and Yuri Zhdanov as Romeo in a version of Prokofiev’s ballet specially choreographed and staged for filming by L. Arnshtam and Leonid Lavrovsky and featuring the Ballet and Orchestra of the Moscow Bolshoi Theatre conducted by Gennadi Rozhdestvensky. Filmed on location in the USSR with English narration.

results.title: Penguins off the page
results.creator_credit: Jon Rowdon and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “RMIT Collection”.
A plasticine animation in a live action classroom. Today’s biology lesson is about the different types of penguins. The peculiar magic of wildlife comes to the classroom as penguins colonise his desk to bring each of the species of penguins to life. As the lesson progresses the class watches each species appear and play amongst the mess on the teacher’s desk.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet (Prokofiev)
results.creator_credit: Rudolf Nureyev, Patricia Foy and ITC-RAI Teatro Alla Scala
results.brief_description: Television production recorded at Palazzo dello Sport, Milan, Italy of William Shakespeare’s tragedy, “Romeo and Juliet”, featuring principal ballet dancers Rudolf Nureyev (Romeo), Carla Fracci (Juliet) and Margot Fonteyn (Lady Capulet). Directed by Nureyev with the cast from his La Scala, Milan production, the Corps de Ballet of Teatro Alla Scala, director Giuseppe Carbone, with music by Prokofiev played by the La Scala Orchestra conducted by Michel Sasson.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rudolf Nureyev, Patricia Foy and ITC-RAI Teatro Alla Scala

results.title: Romeo and Juliet (Luhrmann)
results.creator_credit: Baz Luhrmann, Gabriella Martinelli, Jill Bilcock, Bazmark and Catherine Martin
results.brief_description: Baz Luhrmann, director of “Strictly Ballroom” tells the greatest love story of all time in our time. William Shakespeare’s classic tale of star-crossed lovers is set in Verona Beach; a violent modern city of guns, money and greed. In this opulent world of hate, rival gangs, and families at war Romeo and Juliet are ignited by the passion of forbidden first love and Verona Beach explodes. Shakespeare’s heart wrenching tale of doomed love is told with passion, beauty, wit and furious energy. It’s a film that will kick you in the heart.

results.title: Rock n' roll the greatest years: 1967 volume 2
results.brief_description: Relive some of the great hits of the year 1967, including; “Happy Jack” (The Who), “Autumn almanac” (The Kinks), “Zabadak” (Dave Dee Dozy Beaky Mick & Tich), “San Franciscan nights” (Eric Burdon), “Dedicated to the one I love” (Mamas & Papas), “Respect” (Aretha Franklin), “Mellow yellow” (Donovan), “Hole in my shoe” (Traffic), Soothe me” (Sam & Dave), “I can see for miles” (The Who), “I’m a man (The Spencer Davis Group), “The Wind cries Mary” (Jimi Hendrix experience), “Sweet soul music” (Arthur Conley) and “Creek alley” (Mamas & Papas).

results.title: Romanov
results.creator_credit: Yuri Sokol, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Sokol Films
results.brief_description: The history of the influential royal Romanov family and their descendants search for identity are the subject of this SBS funded documentary. The tape covers present attitudes in Russia towards a monarchy, and follows the story of one Australian Romanov member who, with his wife, returns to Russia to research his heritage.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yuri Sokol, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Sokol Films

results.title: Romancing the Stone (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Robert Zemeckis, Michael Douglas, El Corazon Productions and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: A best-selling romance writer, played by Kathleen Turner, gets more than bargained for when she goes to Colombia to find her kidnapped sister. There’s a mysterious man hanging around, the jungle is full of hungry crocodiles and the kidnappers are out to get her. Luckily a hero right out of her imagination (Michael Douglas) is there to rescue her…but for a price. This is a film that recalls the spirit of the old movie matinee serials.
